[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcl7l9pm8[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDuring fuzz testing of the Mongoose codebase with libFuzzer under AddressSanitizer,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39man out-of-bounds heap read was detected in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Specifically, a one-byte read occurs just past the end of a [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m-byte packet buffer, resulting in a heap-buffer-overflow error.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue type  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  AddressSanitizer reports a heap-buffer-overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- What happens  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The fuzzer harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m allocates a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket buffer of [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes via `malloc`.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. It passes this buffer into the TCP/IP stack entry point `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Inside `mg_tcpip_rx`, control is dispatched to `rx_icmp`. At line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` reads one byte beyond the allocated buffer boundary [0m[1;39m([0m[39maddress [0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m…[0m[1;36m0172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggering the sanitizer error.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Key observations  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The failing address is exactly one byte past the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m…[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m…[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • AddressSanitizer’s shadow memory indicates a “fa” redzone immediately following[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe region.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Call stack:  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      rx_icmp → mg_tcpip_rx → LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput → FuzzerLoop → main  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The packet structure [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and its length metadata are central to [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderstanding why the overflow occurs.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code areas for investigation  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • net_builtin.c, function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: the parsing logic that [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreads packet fields without verifying available length.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • net_builtin.c, function `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: how packet length and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdispatch to `rx_icmp` are handled.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • test/fuzz.c, `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: how the input [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer is allocated, initialized, and passed to the networking functions.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Definition of the `pkt` structure and any length or boundary checks associated [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith ICMP packet handling.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNo root-cause analysis or remediation steps are included; this report is limited to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdescribing the observed overflow.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m860[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_hexdump[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, len > [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m ? [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m: len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m861[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated - runt?[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m862[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_mac_check &&[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m863[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst, ifp->mac, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m &&[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m864[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst, broadcast, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:147[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m152[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m147[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35msend_syn[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_connection *c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m148[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:  pkt->pay =[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m388[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Core Insight and Root Cause:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow in rx_icmp stems from unvalidated payload pointers and lengths [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputed by [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m blindly computes pkt->pay.len = raw_end - p, even if p[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlies outside the original packet buffer, causing a huge length or negative [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderflow. rx_icmp then memcpy’s up to pkt->pay.len bytes without verifying the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload truly lies within buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m..len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, leading to a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand potentially larger[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Critical Logic to Preserve:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overall flow of mg_tcpip_rx → mkpay → rx_ip → rx_icmp must remain [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munchanged so that all existing protocols [0m[1;39m([0m[39mDHCP, ARP, TCP, UDP, ICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m continue [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mworking correctly.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must not alter the fuzzer harness or higher-level dispatch logic.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A zero-length payload must still be allowed: rx_icmp should reply with empty [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayloads when valid, small ICMP echo requests arrive.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Proposed Patches [0m[1;39m([0m[39mapplied to initial codebase[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Harden [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with pointer-range checking:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - In src/net_builtin.c, replace the existing [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m implementation with:[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           char *start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           char *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart < raw_start || start > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Pointer out of the received packet; no valid payload[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             pkt->pay.buf = NULL;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             pkt->pay.buf = start;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end - start[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Rationale: Guarantees pkt->pay.buf always points inside the original buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand that len does not underflow or exceed raw.len.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Add explicit bounds checks in [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - At the top of rx_icmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbefore any dereferences of pkt->icmp or pkt->pay[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minsert:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure we have a full ICMP header in the received packet[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t min_needed = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < min_needed || pkt->pay.buf == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated or no valid payload[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Just after computing plen, enforce that payload falls within raw buffer:[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Clamp plen so pkt->pay.buf + plen <= raw_end[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *raw_end = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *pay_end = pkt->pay.buf + plen;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpay_end > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           plen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end - pkt->pay.buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Rationale: Adds a second line of defense specifically for ICMP—guards [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39magainst any mkpay oversight or future code changes. Ensures memcpy only reads from [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalid memory.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Functionality:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Legitimate packets with correctly computed payloads will satisfy the new [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks and proceed as before.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Zero-length payloads or packets with only headers will still trigger a valid [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP echo reply [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwith zero payload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to external APIs, harness, or test code.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side-Effects & Mitigation:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Slight added branch instructions in the hot path; negligible cost compared to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafety gain.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other protocols using mkpay [0m[1;39m([0m[39mDNS over UDP, DHCP parsing, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m benefit [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom the hardened pointer validation.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing tests will pass unchanged because payload pointers remain valid for [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwell-formed packets.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. References to Similar Patterns:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In rx_dhcp_client, the code already does `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t*[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;` to guard header parsing. Our mkpay guard parallels that style—first, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mverify header presence, then parse options.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The boundary check in mg_tcpip_rx for Ethernet and IP headers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`if [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m+[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m inspired our ICMP header [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength check.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. No harness or test modifications required. All changes are internal to [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnet_builtin.c.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy implementing these two complementary measures—hardening mkpay at the source of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload computation and reinforcing bounds checks in rx_icmp—we eliminate the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone-byte overflow reported by AddressSanitizer without altering existing behavior [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor performance in the normal code paths.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 14:09:08][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=39399;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=761404;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m2[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m          static void [1;35mmkpay[0m[1m([0mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[1m)[0m [1m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -  pkt->pay =                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -      [1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1m([0m[1m([0mchar *[1m)[0m p, [1m([0msize_t[1m)[0m [1m([0m&pkt->raw.buf[1m[[0mpkt->raw.len[1m][0m - [1m([0mchar *[1m)[0m p[1m)[0m[1m)[0m;   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  char *start = [1m([0mchar *[1m)[0m p;                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  char *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  [35m/[0m[35m/[0m Only accept payload pointers in [1m[[0mraw_start, raw_end[1m)[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  if [1m([0mstart [1m<[0m[39m raw_start || start >= raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->pay.buf = NULL;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->pay.buf = start;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end - start[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m static uint32_t [0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t sum, const void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-799[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m808[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m19[0m[39m @@[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      char *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      char *hdr = pkt->pay.buf;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Guard: full ICMP header must fit[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr == NULL || hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcl7l9pm8[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe project’s ICMP packet handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp` in `src/net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m was crashing [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munder fuzzing with AddressSanitizer reporting a one-byte heap-buffer-overflow at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe boundary of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation. The overflow occurred when reading [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type` beyond the allocated `pkt->raw.buf` region. A patch was attempted[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Revised the helper `mkpay` to set `pkt->pay.buf` and `pkt->pay.len` only if the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload pointer falls within the raw buffer.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Added an early return in `rx_icmp` if the raw buffer is smaller than the minimum [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcombined header size or if no valid payload is present.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Clamped the payload length so that `pkt->pay.buf + plen` does not exceed the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer end.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the same heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` at the same [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress and callsite reappeared.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzer output [0m[1;39m([0m[39mAddressSanitizer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m reports a heap-buffer-overflow reading one byte [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, exactly one past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap buffer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The invalid read happens in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c`, when accessing `pkt->icmp->type`.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Call stack:  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. rx_icmp  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. mg_tcpip_rx  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Fuzzer driver entry points[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The allocation of `pkt->raw.buf` occurs in the fuzzer harness via `malloc`, using[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe entire input buffer as raw packet data.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No checks in the original code ensure that the raw input is large enough to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontain the Ethernet, IP, and ICMP headers before dereferencing `pkt->icmp`.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Calculated `start` as the payload pointer, `raw_start` and `raw_end` as bounds[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof `pkt->raw.buf`.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If `start` is outside `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, set `pkt->pay` to a zero-length [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer. Otherwise, set `pkt->pay.buf = start` and `pkt->pay.len = raw_end - start`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. At the top of `rx_icmp`:  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Computed `min_needed = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Early return if `pkt->raw.len < min_needed` or `pkt->pay.buf == NULL`.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Before copying payload into a transmit packet:  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Clamped `plen` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpayload length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m so that `pkt->pay.buf + plen` does not exceed [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len`.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReproduction Log After Patch  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzer run shows the same AddressSanitizer report at `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The one-byte read overflow is still triggered at the same address [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand with the same [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer length.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The early-return guard and clamping code did not prevent the dereference of [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type`.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The computation of `min_needed` versus the actual memory layout of [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf`, `pkt->eth`, `pkt->ip`, and `pkt->icmp`. Confirm that the header [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->eth`, `pkt->ip`, `pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are only valid within the buffer and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat their offsets are correctly guarded.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The initialization and usage paths of `pkt->eth`, `pkt->ip`, and `pkt->icmp`, to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mverify they are non‐NULL and fully in‐bounds before any field access.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Interactions between `mkpay` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpayload slicing[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the header pointer arithmetic [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `rx_icmp`, ensuring no overlapping or misaligned pointer arithmetic leads to [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreading past the buffer.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any additional code paths that touch ICMP headers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., packet construction or [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother protocol handlers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for similar boundary assumptions.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m505[0m[39m:    struct connstate *s = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct connstate *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m506[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->mac, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->mac[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m507[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->recv.len >= MG_MAX_RECV_SIZE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m508[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"max_recv_buf_size reached"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m509[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->recv.size - c->recv.len < pkt->pay.len &&[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m510[0m[39m:               ![0m[1;35mmg_iobuf_resize[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&c->recv, c->recv.len + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m511[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"oom"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m512[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m513[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&c->recv.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mc->recv.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m514[0m[39m:      c->recv.len += pkt->pay.len;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m515[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MG_EV_READ, &pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m516[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m517[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m518[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m519[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m520[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mtx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, uint8_t *dst_mac, uint32_t [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdst_ip,[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m521[0m[39m:                     uint8_t flags, uint16_t sport, uint16_t dport,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m522[0m[39m:                     uint32_t seq, uint32_t ack, const void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m523[0m[39m:#if [0m[1;36m0[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m524[0m[39m:  uint8_t opts[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m{[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0xb4[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m MSS = [0m[1;36m1460[0m[39m, SACK permitted[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m525[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mflags & TH_SYN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m526[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handshake? Set MSS[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m527[0m[39m:    buf = opts;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m528[0m[39m:    len = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mopts[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m529[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m530[0m[39m:#endif[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m531[0m[39m:  struct ip *ip =[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m532[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, dst_mac, [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, ifp->ip, dst_ip, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m533[0m[39m:  struct tcp *tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m534[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtcp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m535[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf != NULL && len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmemmove[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, buf, len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m536[0m[39m:  tcp->sport = sport;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m539[0m[39m:  tcp->ack = ack;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m540[0m[39m:  tcp->flags = flags;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m541[0m[39m:  tcp->win = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[39mMIP_TCP_WIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m542[0m[39m:  tcp->off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m << [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m543[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mflags & TH_SYN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m tcp->off = [0m[1;36m0x70[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handshake? header size [0m[1;36m28[0m[39m bytes[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m544[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m545[0m[39m:  uint32_t cs = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m546[0m[39m:  uint16_t n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m547[0m[39m:  uint8_t pseudo[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m{[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, ip->proto, [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn >> [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn & [0m[1;36m255[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m548[0m[39m:  cs = [0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[39mcs, tcp, n[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m549[0m[39m:  cs = [0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[39mcs, &ip->src, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip->src[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m550[0m[39m:  cs = [0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[39mcs, &ip->dst, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m:#define MG_EPHEMERAL_PORT_BASE [0m[1;36m32768[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mPDIFF[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m:#ifndef MIP_TCP_KEEPALIVE_MS[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_KEEPALIVE_MS [0m[1;36m45000[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP keep-alive period, ms[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m:#endif[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_ACK_MS [0m[1;36m150[0m[39m    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timeout for ACKing[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m12[0m[39m:#define MIP_ARP_RESP_MS [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timeout for ARP response[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m13[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_SYN_MS [0m[1;36m15000[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timeout for connection establishment[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m14[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_FIN_MS [0m[1;36m1000[0m[39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timeout for closing connection[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m15[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_WIN [0m[1;36m6000[0m[39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP window size[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m16[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m17[0m[39m:struct connstate [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m18[0m[39m:  uint32_t seq, ack;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP seq/ack counters[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m19[0m[39m:  uint64_t timer;              [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP keep-alive [0m[35m/[0m[39m ACK timer[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m:  uint32_t acked;              [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Last ACK-ed number[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:  size_t unacked;              [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not acked bytes[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m22[0m[39m:  uint8_t mac[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;              [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Peer MAC address[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:  uint8_t ttype;               [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timer type. [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m: ack, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: keep-alive[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_KEEPALIVE [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Connection is idle for long, send keepalive[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_ACK [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Peer sent us data, we have to ack it soon[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_ARP [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m ARP resolve sent, waiting for response[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_SYN [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m SYN sent, waiting for response[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_FIN [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m FIN sent, waiting until terminating the connection[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:  uint8_t tmiss;         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Number of keep-alive misses[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:  struct mg_iobuf raw;   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m For TLS only. Incoming raw data[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:  bool fin_rcvd;         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m We have received FIN from the peer[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:  bool twclosure;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m-way closure done[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:#pragma [0m[1;35mpack[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpush, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:struct lcp [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:  uint8_t addr, ctrl, proto[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, code, id, len[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:struct eth [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:  uint8_t dst[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Destination MAC address[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:  uint8_t src[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Source MAC address[0m                                         [2m                [0m
