[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:838[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m843[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m838[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m839[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"IP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m840[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || pkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m841[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m842[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m843[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:892[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m897[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:795[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:790[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m790[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dropped silently.."[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m791[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m792[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m793[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo eliminate the one‐byte heap‐buffer‐overflow in rx_icmp once and for all, we must[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstop assuming that pkt->icmp lives at pkt->ip+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor just beyond the [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m‐byte IP [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstruct[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and instead derive both the ICMP header pointer and its payload strictly [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom the already‐computed pkt->pay that mg_tcpip_rx set up.  Then, before touching [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39many ICMP fields, we do a direct pointer‐arithmetic check against the true buffer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend.  In practice this means:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Reapply [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand tighten[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mkpay in its original position so that pkt->pay.buf points[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexactly at the first byte after the IPv4 header+options, and pkt->pay.len is the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbyte‐count to the raw buffer end:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Keep or refine your “start < raw_start || start > raw_end” guard.  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptionally[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchange it to `start >= raw_end` so that [0m[33mstart[0m[39m==end yields pay.[0m[33mbuf[0m[39m=[0m[35mNULL[0m[39m, pay.[0m[33mlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m.[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No further changes to mkpay itself are strictly needed once we guard header [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing correctly.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In rx_ip [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot in rx_icmp![0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, replace the existing ICMP branch  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround “if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m … pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m… [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   with the following logic:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a.  Compute  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *raw_end   = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *hdr       = pkt->pay.buf;    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m guaranteed by mg_tcpip_rx to be [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP‐payload start  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b.  If hdr is NULL [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmkpay failed[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or `hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end`, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn early.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c.  Now safely assign  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m hdr;  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d.  Re‐invoke mkpay to carve out the post‐header payload:  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e.  Finally call  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This ensures:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – ICMP header is fully in‐bounds before any dereference.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – We correctly handle IPv4 options [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m because pkt->pay.buf already [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpoints past the full IP header.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – No need to touch rx_icmp’s internal logic except to keep its existing guard [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mit becomes a redundant second check[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Leave rx_icmp unchanged except to preserve its current optional double‐guard [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len vs. min_needed[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  The heavy lifting happens upstream.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhy this works and preserves existing logic:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- mg_tcpip_rx already computed pkt->pay.buf at exactly the IP‐payload start [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtaking[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIHL into account[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  By reusing that, we unify both “no‐options” and “with‐options” [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcases.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A direct pointer check against raw_end prevents any out‐of‐bounds read, rather [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthan trusting raw.len or pkt->pay.len.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- We do not touch the fuzzer harness, UDP/TCP paths, or any external utilities.  We[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39monly harden the ICMP path.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This matches the pattern in rx_ip6, where they compute pkt->icmp from pkt->ip6+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand then do `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return; [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWe are simply adapting that robust idiom to IPv4.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPotential side effects & mitigation:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[3;35mNone[0m[39m of the existing UDP/TCP paths are affected because we only change the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` branch.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- IPv4 fragment drop logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe “frag” branch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remains as is.  Fragments still are [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot passed to ICMP code.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- We do not alter any public APIs or behavior except to silently drop ICMP packets [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat are too short—exactly the safe behavior we always had for truncated frames.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The double‐checking in rx_icmp itself remains harmless.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReference:[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe IPv6 ICMP handler in rx_ip6 [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m838[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m843[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m already follows this exact pattern [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof bounds‐checking before mkpay→rx_icmp.  We mirror that approach for IPv4 here.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:790[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--- a/src/net_builtin.c[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+++ b/src/net_builtin.c[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-795[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m13[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m795[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m27[0m[39m @@ static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m existing fragment handling[0m[33m...[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Old, unsafe ICMPv4 path:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m New, safe ICMPv4 path: derive header from pkt->pay.buf[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        char *raw_end   = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        char *hdr       = pkt->pay.buf;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IP payload start[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Guard: must have space for full ICMP header[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr == NULL || hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          return;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m hdr;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Re-carve payload after ICMP header[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP path[0m[33m...[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m UDP path[0m[33m...[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-147[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m147[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m16[0m[39m @@ static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   char *start    = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   char *raw_end   = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart < raw_start || start > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Only accept payload pointers in [0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart < raw_start || start >= raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->pay.buf = NULL;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->pay.buf = start;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end - start[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Compute IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in bytes[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    char *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    char *hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ihl;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Header must fit and include full ICMP header[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhdr;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Carve out payload after ICMP header[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-881[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m17[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m902[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m @@[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Basic length check: Ethernet + minimal IP header[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcl7l9pm8[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA fuzzing run against the Mongoose codebase uncovered a heap-buffer-overflow in the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP receive path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m`. The overflow happens [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen reading one byte past the end of a dynamically allocated packet buffer. A [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch was attempted that [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m tightened the payload pointer calculation in `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto clamp to the raw buffer bounds and [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m added a guard around the ICMP header [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing in `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. Despite these changes, the same AddressSanitizer error [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrecurred in `rx_icmp`, indicating the patch did not prevent the out-of-bounds [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccess.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- During fuzz testing with LibFuzzer, `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` exercised [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, leading into `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer flagged a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte heap-buffer-overflow: a read at address [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which is exactly one byte past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The backtrace shows the access in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, called via:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mLLVMFuzzerTestOneInput[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The packet was allocated by `malloc` in the test harness, sized by the fuzzer [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minput length.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Original: set `pkt->pay` to `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mp, buf+len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without bounds checking.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Patched: compute `raw_start = pkt->raw.buf`, `raw_end = raw_start + [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->raw.len`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - If `p` is outside `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, set `pkt->pay` to empty [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[33mbuf[0m[39m=[0m[35mNULL[0m[39m, [0m[33mlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Otherwise set `pkt->pay.buf = p` and `pkt->pay.len = raw_end - p`.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` handling of `proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Original:  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Patched: wrapped in a block that checks:  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - `hdr = pkt->pay.buf` is non-null  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - `hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <= raw_end`  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Only then cast to `pkt->icmp`, call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand invoke `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same AddressSanitizer log recurred immediately after patching.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash remains at `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, reading one byte past the allocated [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The backtrace and heap region details are identical, confirming the overflow was [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot averted.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFurther Investigation  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Inspect the implementation of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m to identify which read [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor field access overruns the payload buffer.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Verify how `pkt->raw.len` and `pkt->pay.len` are initialized and updated before [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP parsing.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Examine any uses of `pkt->pay` inside `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`—especially loops or offsets [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat assume additional bytes.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Review related packet-parsing logic for other protocols [0m[1;39m([0m[39mUDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, ensuring consistent bounds checks.  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Audit the struct layouts for `pkt`, `raw`, `icmp`, and how padding or alignment [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmight affect pointer arithmetic.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
