[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m884[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:790[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m790[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dropped silently.."[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m791[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m792[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m793[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m152[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:  pkt->pay =[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo definitively eliminate the [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte heap‐buffer‐overflow in the ICMP receive path,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwe must enforce strict buffer bounds at every stage where we interpret or consume [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP headers and payload. The last patch tightened [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and guarded one ICMP [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch in [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but three additional unchecked code paths remain:[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The IPv4 fragment handler in [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m also casts to struct icmp without bounds [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecking.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. The generic [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m entry point dereferences pkt->icmp->type before [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mverifying the ICMP header lies inside the packet buffer.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. The IPv4 “options” path in [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m does not validate that the IHL*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset is within raw.buf bounds before calling [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOur patch strategy is:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Strengthen [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready mostly done[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to clamp or zero‐out any OOB pointer.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Keep the existing logic that sets pay.buf = NULL and pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m when p < [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw_start or p ≥ raw_end.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This ensures downstream code never sees a bogus pay.len.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m’s IPv4 branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Before computing payload offset, extract IHL = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Check that pkt->raw.len ≥ [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + IHL. If not, return early [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mtruncated[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Trim pkt->raw.len to the IP total length as before.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Only then call [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with the IHL‐adjusted pointer.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This prevents [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from ever being handed a pointer beyond the allocated raw [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. In [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe IPv4 fragment/simple‐ICMP handler[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Before `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` compute hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + IP_header_len [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Check hdr ≥ raw_start and hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ≤ raw_end. If not, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Then set pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhdr, call [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, hdr + sizeof [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and invoke [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. In [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   At the top, before any `pkt->icmp->…` access, do:  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m raw_start = pkt->raw.buf; raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m If hdr < raw_start or hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end, return [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This guarantees that dereferencing pkt->icmp->type and computing hlen cannot [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOOB.[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy applying these four localized, conservative checks:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- We never alter test harness or fuzzing logic.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- We never catch “all” errors or swallow real memory bugs; we only drop packets [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat are mal‐formed/truncated.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- We preserve existing functionality for well‐formed IP/ICMP frames.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- We avoid removing features [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., IPv4 options support[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and merely add [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafe‐guards around their pointer arithmetic.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPotential side effects: malformed packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtruncated IP header, invalid IHL, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincomplete ICMP header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will now be silently dropped rather than partially [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessed. This matches the existing behavior elsewhere [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., early returns on [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len < header_size`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. No impact on tests for valid packets.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReferences to existing patterns:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The UDP/TCP code paths already check `pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to drop [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated headers.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The IPv6 path early‐returns if header too short.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWe are simply enforcing the same discipline on IPv4 options, rx_ip’s ICMP path, and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrx_icmp’s entry.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Addressable:           [0m[1;36m00[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Partially addressable: [0m[1;36m01[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m [0m[1;36m03[0m[39m [0m[1;36m04[0m[39m [0m[1;36m05[0m[39m [0m[1;36m06[0m[39m [0m[1;36m07[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap left redzone:       fa[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Freed heap region:       fd[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack left redzone:      f1[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack mid redzone:       f2[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack after return:      f5[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack use after scope:   f8[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global redzone:          f9[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global init order:       f6[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcl7l9pm8[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue arose during a libFuzzer run of the Mongoose codebase, where [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer reported a one-byte heap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow occurs when reading immediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap allocation. A patch was attempted that:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Added bounds checks in `mkpay` to ensure the payload pointer lies within the raw [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket buffer.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Added a guard in `rx_icmp` to verify the ICMP header is fully contained in the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw buffer.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Revised IPv4 processing to compute and validate the Internet Header Length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mplace the ICMP header pointer accordingly, and then carve out the payload via [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mkpay`.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Added a similar IHL-based payload extraction for the non-ICMP IPv4 branch.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying this patch, the fuzzer still triggers the same heap-buffer-overflow [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat `rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, indicating the patch did not prevent the out-of-bounds read.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzzing harness allocates a heap buffer, fills it with arbitrary data, and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpasses it through `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which eventually calls `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand then `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer reports a read of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at an address exactly one past the end [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap region [0m[1;39m([0m[39mallocated in the fuzz test[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Backtrace pinpoints the overflow to line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in `net_builtin.c` within [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, struct pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. The code reads from `pkt->icmp->type` without[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msufficiently verifying that the ICMP header is entirely in bounds.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKey Observations  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The overflow repeatedly occurs at the same byte offset [0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw buffer end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The reported region is only [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes long, suggesting minimal or malformed [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket data.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The read happens even when `pkt->icmp` is set, indicating header pointer [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidation is insufficient or bypassed.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. The harness’s small allocation size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is enough to trigger the guard [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfailures.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: replaced the unbounded `mg_str_n` call with explicit pointer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand length calculations, zeroing the payload when `p` lies outside the raw buffer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrange.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- At the top of `rx_icmp`: inserted a check that `pkt->icmp` header pointer and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` fit within `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. Returns early if not.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the IPv4/ICMP branch: computed the IHL [0m[1;39m([0m[39mInternet Header Length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, derived `hdr [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m= ip + ihl`, and guarded that `ihl >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdo not exceed the raw buffer. Updated `pkt->icmp = hdr` and invoked `mkpay` at `hdr[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the generic IPv4 branch: computed and validated IHL and then called `mkpay` at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe post-header offset.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m executions, AddressSanitizer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill reports the same heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` at the same location.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The backtrace, allocation size, and offset are identical to the initial failure, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating the new bounds checks did not intercept the out-of-bounds access.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic that sets or advances `pkt->icmp` prior to `rx_icmp`, including any [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mearlier skips or type-based dispatch in `mg_tcpip_rx`.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Verification that the computed IHL matches actual buffer lengths and that [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.len` is correctly truncated/tracked when headers are malformed.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The interplay between Ethernet, IP, and ICMP length fields—particularly whether [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip->len`, `pkt->icmp->type`, or other fields can cause `hdr` or `pkt->icmp` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto point out of bounds.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Shared or common header-validation routines used before `rx_icmp`, such as checks[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `rx_ip`, `rx_ip6`, and the initial packet framing logic. Continuous coverage of [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39medge cases where the header field values underflow or overflow the raw buffer.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:790[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m790[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dropped silently.."[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m791[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m792[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m793[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:854[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m897[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m854[0m[39m:void [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m855[0m[39m:  struct pkt pkt;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m856[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m860[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_hexdump[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, len > [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m ? [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m: len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m861[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated - runt?[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m862[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_mac_check &&[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m863[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst, ifp->mac, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m &&[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m864[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst, broadcast, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m865[0m[39m:    return;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m866[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_crc32_check && len > [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m867[0m[39m:    len -= [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mTODO[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscaprile[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: check on bigendian[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m868[0m[39m:    uint32_t crc = [0m[1;35mmg_crc32[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf, len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m869[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf + len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, &crc, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mcrc[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m870[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m871[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x806[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m876[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x86dd[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m879[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip6->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0x6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m880[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m883[0m[39m:    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m884[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Centralize and harden ICMP parsing in the IPv4 path of mg_tcpip_rx:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. In the `pkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` branch, immediately after you [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncate `pkt.raw.len` to the advertised IP length, test for ICMP [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprotocol [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore falling through to `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Extract the IHL [0m[1;39m([0m[39mInternet Header Length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from the low nibble of [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt.ip->ver`.  If IHL < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m, return early [0m[1;39m([0m[39minvalid IPv4 header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Compute the byte offset of the ICMP header:  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Then compute the overall buffer bounds:  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        raw_start = pkt.raw.buf  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        raw_end   = raw_start + pkt.raw.len  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      If `hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end`, return early.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Assign `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhdr`, carve out the payload with [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, then call `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn—bypassing `rx_ip`.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e. This guarantees that any call to `rx_icmp` from the IPv4‐ICMP branch sees a [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfully validated header pointer and payload.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Remove or disable the existing `proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` branch inside `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  By [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling all ICMP directly in `mg_tcpip_rx`, you avoid duplicated logic and [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meliminate the chance that `rx_ip` will set `pkt->icmp` without a proper bounds [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Keep a defensive guard at the top of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Compute `raw_start` and `raw_end` from `pkt->raw`.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Let `hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp`.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • If `hdr < raw_start` or `hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end`, return [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   After this guard, it is safe to read `pkt->icmp->type`.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Leave `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` as-is [0m[1;39m([0m[39mit already zeroes the payload when `p` is out of range[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor simplify it to clamp `p` within `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, but do not modify [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness or test code.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Rationale and safety:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By hoisting ICMP parsing into `mg_tcpip_rx`, you validate header length, IHL, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand raw‐buffer boundaries exactly once.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - You remove all code paths where `pkt->icmp` could be set without satisfying [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <= raw_end`.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The existing `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` guard acts as a secondary check and will never be [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggered in normal traffic.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes outside `net_builtin.c`—fuzz harness, tests, and non-ICMP code [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremain untouched.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Verification:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run the original libFuzzer target with the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte failing input; the early [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn in `mg_tcpip_rx` will prevent any out‐of‐bounds read.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm legitimate ICMP echo requests/responses still traverse `rx_icmp` and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproduce correct behavior.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This single, centralized patch eliminates the one‐byte read past the heap [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer without disrupting existing functionality.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle IPv4 [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    else[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Validate IPv4 version[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Compute IHL [0m[1;39m([0m[39mInternet Header Length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in bytes[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Validate IHL and ensure header fits[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || pkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set payload start after IP header[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle ICMP directly[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      char *raw_start = pkt.raw.buf;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      char *raw_end = raw_start + pkt.raw.len;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      char *hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.ip + ihl;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure full ICMP header is within buffer[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <= raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        pkt.icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m hdr;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      return;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Non-ICMP fallback[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
