[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcl7l9pm8[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-detected heap-buffer-overflow in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlocated in `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, triggered by a one-byte [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread past the end of an allocated buffer when fuzzing the ICMP packet handling. A [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch was attempted that:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Inserts early bounds checks in `rx_icmp` to ensure the ICMP header lies within [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe packet buffer.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Removes the original ICMP handling path under `mg_tcpip_rx` for IPv4 proto [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreplaces it with an early return.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Consolidates IPv4 parsing in the Ethernet branch, validates header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand re-invokes `rx_icmp` with fresh bounds checks.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the same heap-buffer-overflow is still reported at the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame location in `rx_icmp`, indicating the patch did not eliminate the [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds access.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A fuzzing run invoked `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which allocates a buffer for [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe test input and calls the TCP/IP receive routines.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_tcpip_rx` eventually calls `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. Inside `rx_icmp`, a [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone-byte read beyond `pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len` is performed, leading to a [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer output shows:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Overflow at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, immediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocation.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Call stack traces through `rx_icmp`, `mg_tcpip_rx`, and the fuzz driver.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The problematic code at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in `net_builtin.c` reads `pkt->icmp->type` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor similar without ensuring the ICMP header is fully inside the buffer.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m380[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, code was added to compute `raw_start`, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`raw_end`, and a pointer `hdr` to the ICMP header. If `hdr` is out of bounds or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` exceeds `raw_end`, the function returns early.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the IPv4 processing branch of `mg_tcpip_rx`:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The separate branch for `pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` was replaced by an [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munconditional return comment [0m[1;39m([0m[39m“ICMP handled in mg_tcpip_rx; drop here”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The Ethernet + IPv4 branch was refactored to validate total frame length, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck IPv4 version, compute IHL, ensure the header fits, and then call `rx_icmp` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39monly if the ICMP header is in-bounds.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other protocols fall through to `rx_ip` as before.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Post-Patch Test Log  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The same fuzz command [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m was re-executed.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer reports the identical heap-buffer-overflow at [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`, reading past the same buffer boundary, with the same call [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This indicates that the early-return guard in `rx_icmp` is not always [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreventing the out-of-bounds read, or that `rx_icmp` is still being called in other[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontexts without the intended checks.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The invocation paths to `rx_icmp` in `mg_tcpip_rx`: verify every call site [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplies the new bounds checks.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The buffer length and pointer arithmetic around `pkt->raw.len`, `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39massignments to `pkt->icmp`: ensure the packet payload region is correctly defined [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore dereferencing `pkt->icmp`.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The structure and usage of `struct pkt`, particularly fields `raw.buf`, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`raw.len`, `icmp`, and the interplay of `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` that sets `pkt->pay` and may [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maffect buffer boundaries.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any alternative branches or protocol handlers that might still call `rx_icmp` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout validating packet length.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzz harness assumptions [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., imposed minimal packet size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure they [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmatch real-world constraints and do not bypass bounds safeguards.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m861[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated - runt?[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m862[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_mac_check &&[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m863[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst, ifp->mac, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m &&[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m864[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst, broadcast, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m865[0m[39m:    return;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m866[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_crc32_check && len > [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m867[0m[39m:    len -= [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mTODO[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscaprile[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: check on bigendian[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m868[0m[39m:    uint32_t crc = [0m[1;35mmg_crc32[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf, len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m869[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf + len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, &crc, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mcrc[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m870[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m871[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x806[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m872[0m[39m:    pkt.arp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct arp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m873[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.arp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m874[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, MG_TCPIP_EV_ARP, &pkt.raw[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m875[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_arp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m876[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x86dd[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m877[0m[39m:    pkt.ip6 = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip6 *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m878[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m879[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip6->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0x6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m880[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m881[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m883[0m[39m:    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m884[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"net_builtin.h"[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m:#if [0m[1;35mdefined[0m[1;39m([0m[39mMG_ENABLE_TCPIP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m && MG_ENABLE_TCPIP[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m:#define MG_EPHEMERAL_PORT_BASE [0m[1;36m32768[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mPDIFF[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m:#ifndef MIP_TCP_KEEPALIVE_MS[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_KEEPALIVE_MS [0m[1;36m45000[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP keep-alive period, ms[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m:#endif[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_ACK_MS [0m[1;36m150[0m[39m    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timeout for ACKing[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m12[0m[39m:#define MIP_ARP_RESP_MS [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timeout for ARP response[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m13[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_SYN_MS [0m[1;36m15000[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timeout for connection establishment[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m14[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_FIN_MS [0m[1;36m1000[0m[39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timeout for closing connection[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m15[0m[39m:#define MIP_TCP_WIN [0m[1;36m6000[0m[39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP window size[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m16[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m17[0m[39m:struct connstate [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m18[0m[39m:  uint32_t seq, ack;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP seq/ack counters[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m19[0m[39m:  uint64_t timer;              [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m TCP keep-alive [0m[35m/[0m[39m ACK timer[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m:  uint32_t acked;              [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Last ACK-ed number[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:  size_t unacked;              [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not acked bytes[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m22[0m[39m:  uint8_t mac[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;              [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Peer MAC address[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:  uint8_t ttype;               [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Timer type. [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m: ack, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: keep-alive[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_KEEPALIVE [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Connection is idle for long, send keepalive[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_ACK [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Peer sent us data, we have to ack it soon[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_ARP [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m ARP resolve sent, waiting for response[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_SYN [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m SYN sent, waiting for response[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:#define MIP_TTYPE_FIN [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m FIN sent, waiting until terminating the connection[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:  uint8_t tmiss;         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Number of keep-alive misses[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:  struct mg_iobuf raw;   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m For TLS only. Incoming raw data[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:  bool fin_rcvd;         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m We have received FIN from the peer[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:  bool twclosure;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m-way closure done[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:#pragma [0m[1;35mpack[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpush, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:struct lcp [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:222[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m240[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:static struct ip *[0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, uint8_t *mac_dst,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:                        uint8_t proto, uint32_t ip_src, uint32_t ip_dst,[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:                        size_t plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  struct eth *eth = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ifp->tx.buf;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  struct ip *ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39meth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth->dst, mac_dst, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m228[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth->src, ifp->mac, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth->src[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Use our MAC[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m229[0m[39m:  eth->type = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m230[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m231[0m[39m:  ip->ver = [0m[1;36m0x45[0m[39m;               [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Version [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, header length [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m words[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m232[0m[39m:  ip->frag = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x4000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Don't fragment[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m233[0m[39m:  ip->len = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m234[0m[39m:  ip->ttl = [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m235[0m[39m:  ip->proto = proto;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m236[0m[39m:  ip->src = ip_src;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m237[0m[39m:  ip->dst = ip_dst;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m238[0m[39m:  ip->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m239[0m[39m:  return ip;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m240[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The root cause is that `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` continues to assume that `pkt->icmp` points [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto a fully in‐bounds ICMP header, but multiple code paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv4 via `rx_ip`, IPv6 [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvia `rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m invoke `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without a robust raw‐buffer length check. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone‐byte read past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte buffer happens because the ICMP header [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m can be set to a location outside `pkt->raw.buf + [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->raw.len`, bypassing the existing guard in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or never hitting it at [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mall.[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Critical logic to preserve  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The logic for responding to ICMP echo requests [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The existing `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` usage for setting `pkt->pay` before building replies.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Fragment handling and non‐ICMP protocol fall‐throughs in `rx_ip` and `rx_ip6`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Proposed patches  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Strengthen the IPv4 ICMP dispatch in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – **Before** dereferencing or assigning `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, insert a strict bounds check:  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Compute the IP header length in bytes via `ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Verify `ihl >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and that `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ihl + [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <= pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len`.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • If the check fails, return early.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – This ensures that any fall‐through path from `mg_tcpip_rx → rx_ip` that [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreaches the ICMP branch never sets an out‐of‐bounds `pkt->icmp`.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Harden the IPv6 ICMP dispatch in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Similarly, insert a guard before `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Let `hdr6 = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • If `hdr6 + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len`, return.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – This prevents any IPv6‐ICMP invocation of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` on truncated buffers.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Reinforce safety in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Although we already inserted an early‐return check in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for sanity, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdouble‐guard by verifying once more that `pkt->icmp` lies fully within `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw.buf, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw.buf + raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – This “belt‐and‐suspenders” approach ensures that any future call into [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without the proper upstream guard still cannot OOB‐read the `type` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfield.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Implementation steps  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Open `src/net_builtin.c`.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` around line [0m[1;36m800[0m[39m, locate the `else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mblock. Prepend:  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* IPv4 ICMP must fit entire header inside raw buffer *[0m[35m/[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf, *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ||[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->ip + ihl + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          return;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Then proceed with the existing `pkt->icmp = [0m[33m...[0m[39m`, `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls unchanged.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In `[0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` around line [0m[1;36m840[0m[39m, inside the `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` block, insert:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* IPv6 ICMP must fit entire header inside raw buffer *[0m[35m/[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf, *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *hdr6 = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->ip6 + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr6 + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Then assign `pkt->icmp` and `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` exactly as before.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` near its top [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround the existing guard[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, ensure the check [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcovers both IPv4 and IPv6 callers:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Double‐check: pkt->icmp must be fully inside the raw buffer *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf, *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->icmp;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr < raw_start || hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Leave the rest of the function intact.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – By placing the strong bounds checks immediately before any assignment or [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdereference of `pkt->icmp`, we block *all* entry points to `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated or maliciously‐crafted inputs.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The dual guard [0m[1;39m([0m[39monce in each dispatch and again in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ensures that [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meven if future code paths introduce new callers, the ICMP‐type read cannot [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderflow or overflow the heap.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Payload‐length checks [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remain in place for reply‐construction [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic; we are not loosening those constraints.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Side effects and mitigation  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Legitimate ICMP packets must still pass these checks. We compute IHL exactly [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mas the code already does for options, and we verify at least a minimal IPv4/IPv6 [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader plus [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes of ICMP header.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – No existing non-ICMP protocols or fuzz harness logic is modified. Fuzzing will[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill reach these checks, and truncated frames will simply be dropped instead of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing a malformed header.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – No external libraries, harness code, or broad exception catches are [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintroduced.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Verification  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Rebuild and re-run the existing unit tests to ensure no regressions.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Re-run `run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m` with AddressSanitizer; confirm absence of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap‐buffer‐overflow in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Optionally, add a small set of new fuzz testcases for minimal‐length ICMP [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets just below the boundary [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., total buffer size = [0m[1;36m14[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirm graceful early return.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
